The average @Ryanair sector length time is 1.5 hours @Robin_Kiely @holworldshow #HWS17
Every 45 seconds an @Ryanair aircraft departs between 0600 and midnight across Europe said @Robin_Kiely @holworldshow #HWS17

No new winter routes from @CorkAirport and @ShannonAirport said @Robin_Kiely @holworldshow #HWS17

We put our aircraft where get the best deals @Robin_Kiely @holworldshow #HWS17 https://t.co/2RH64rQtHg
